title: List of all Android json  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android json  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: LoganSquare
repoList.description: Screaming fast JSON parsing and serialization library for Android.

repoList.name: dsl-json
repoList.description: High performance JVM JSON library

repoList.name: wallpaperboard
repoList.description: Android Json based wallpaper dashboard library

repoList.name: android-json-form-wizard
repoList.description: Android Material Json Form Wizard is a library for creating beautiful form based wizards within your app just by defining json in a particular format.

repoList.name: XmlToJson
repoList.description: Android Library for converting XML to JSON and JSON to XML

repoList.name: jsonapi-converter
repoList.description: JSONAPI-Converter is a Java/Android library that provides support for working with JSONAPI spec

repoList.name: JSONApi
repoList.description: A library to implement the specifications from jsonapi.org with Java for android developers.

repoList.name: jsonloader-library
repoList.description: 📱 Android library to open JSON from assets

repoList.name: JustJson
repoList.description: JSON helper library for Android

repoList.description: Easily add GeoJson layers to your Maps
